column5: Hi all, Still a good 18" of ice here, but I think it's going to go fast now. Got out with my best friend and fishing buddy Roloff the other evening for a couple of hours, nice to have the pup along now its warming up. Got some walleye and a few pike to bite, great way to spend an evening.VIDEO LINKhttps://youtu.be/P96Y8rtlLEw Tight lines all, boat will be coming out soon....YAY!
Nice video Simon! My dog loves chasing sticks too, but she would never drop it at my feet like yours did. Impressive!
Great video Simon. Persistence pays off with supper. Nice to see Roloff on one of your videos again.
Ditto, wondered where the dog had been! Bill

LOL...its about the only time he listens to me.....lol.Quote: Originally Posted by retire55Great video Simon. Persistence pays off with supper. Nice to see Roloff on one of your videos again.Quote: Originally Posted by Bill KrejcaDitto, wondered where the dog had been! Bill Thanks guys, ice fishing with Roloff is difficult, cold and distance are the main barriers having him along, now with the warmer temps he is out with me as much as possible.
Re: Conditions - yeah, good thinking, I figured that's why dog was not in earlier season videos. Bill
